Package org.lwjgl.vulkan

Class VKCapabilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.vulkan.VKCapabilities

  • public class VKCapabilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the capabilities of a Vulkan VkInstance or VkDevice.

    • Field Summary
